name: Cleverly Engaged Marketing
description:
Founded in 2013, Cleverly Engaged Marketing is a digital marketing agency providing a holistic approach to inbound traffic to client websites. Partnering with other agencies and local businesses in Texas, CEM specializes in local seo, website search optimization, wordpress development, social media management, content marketing, public relations and more.
Founder, Corey Barnettt is a contributor to Search Engine Land, Website Magazine and other outlets.
